command.source:
SELECT substr(digits(brk.BRKR_ID),3,8), substr(digits(cba.RBAT_ID),3,8), cba.EFF_DT, cba.TERM_DT, brk.BRKR_NM, coalesce(brk.AP_VEND_NB, ' '), coalesce(brk.AP_CO_CD, ' '), cba.PMT_HOLD_CD, cba.RATE_BSIS_CD, coalesce(cba.RATE_PCT, 0), cba.RATE_PER_CLM_AMT, cba.PMT_TM_CD, date(cba.UPDT_TS), cba.UPDT_USER_ID, date(cba.INSRT_TS)
FROM client_reg.crt_brkr brk, client_reg.crt_clnt_brkr_assc cba
WHERE cba.BRKR_ID = brk.BRKR_ID
command.target: INSERT INTO ${pmt_schema}.kscc210_bkr_rebid ( BRKR_ID, RBAT_ID, EFF_DT, TERM_DT, BRKR_NM, AP_VEND_ID, AP_CO_ID, CR_HOLD_CD, RATE_BSIS_CD, BRKR_FEE_RATE_PCT, BRKR_PER_CLM_AMT, PMT_SCHD_CD, LAST_UPDT_DT, LAST_UPDT_USER_NB, INSRT_DT ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
